avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules

Class NodeFileRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules.NodeRule
      • avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules.NodeFileRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NodeFileRule
extends NodeRule
    This displays Nodes based on information in a file. This class can be used to create an external visualization source.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • NodeFileRule

        public NodeFileRule(java.io.File file)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Reads in data for the NodeFileRule. The file format is node id, radius, red, green, blue. Header data may be included and will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be accessed
